lead_paragraph: Toro Rosso's Carlos Sainz fears he and some other Formula One drivers have had to lose so much weight before the season starts, to compensate for heavier cars, that they risk compromising their health.

headline.print_headline: Weight Loss a Concern for Drivers: Sainz
headline.main: Weight Loss a Concern for Drivers: Sainz
